active_skill.name: Pull-Tab Bomb
active_skill.description:
Throws a bomb at the target, dealing Fire DMG and accumulating Fire Anomaly Buildup.

DMG Multiplier: 532%

Daze Multiplier: 311%

Cooldown 14s

additional_ability.name: Building Heat
additional_ability.description: When there are 2 or more Fire Attribute characters in your squad: Bangboo Chain Attack inflicts 120% more Anomaly Buildup.

chain_attack.name: Shocking Gift
chain_attack.description:
Throws a bomb at the target, dealing Fire DMG and inflicting massive Fire Anomaly Buildup.

DMG Multiplier: 1318%

Daze Multiplier: 188%
